body_html:
I have used tf.train.Saver().restore(sess, "1.ckpt") to restore and for saving the model I have used tf.train.Saver().save(sess, "./model/"+str(epoch)+".ckpt")
after restoration the model gives 0.032 accuracy where after training it is giving around 95%

body:
I have used tf.train.Saver().restore(sess, "1.ckpt") to restore and for saving the model I have used tf.train.Saver().save(sess, "./model/"+str(epoch)+".ckpt")
after restoration the model gives 0.032 accuracy where after training it is giving around 95%
